headline: Ulta appoints new CFO
summary: Christopher DelOrefice will take on the role in December, allowing interim CFO Chris Lialios to return to being senior vice president and controller.

headline: BD Looks Ahead to the Next Era of Manufacturing Excellence in Broken Bow, NE and Celebrates 65 Years of Innovation in the Region
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, proudly commemorates 65 years of manufacturing excellence at its Broken Bow, Nebraska facility—a cornerstone of BD's extensive U.S. manufacturing network.

headline: Fiduciary Management: A Few Holdings That We Find Compelling Over The Long Term
